info.description:
.. figure:: https://cdn.rawgit.com/joajfreitas/eddy/2e495926/icons/eddy_long.png
   :alt: eddy logo

   eddy logo

--------------

|Build Status|

Eddy is a simple static website generator.

-  Create content with github
   `Markdown <https://pythonhosted.org/Markdown/>`__
-  Includes a simple CLI interface
-  Generetad pages can be hosted anywhere

Features
--------

-  Site themes with `Jinja2 <http://jinja.pocoo.org/>`__
-  Use or create personalized stylecheats
-  Support for TeX math equations with
   `Mathjax <https://www.mathjax.org/>`__
-  Syntex highligth with `Pygments <http://pygments.org/>`__
-  Embeded videos

Documentation
-------------

Check the `documentation <http://pythonhosted.org/eddy>`__

Install
-------

::

    pip install eddy
